meanings.sent1: She used spermicide to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: The spermicide effectively stopped the sperm from moving.
meanings.sent3: The spermicide was like a tiny army fighting off the invaders.
meanings.sent4: The spermicide acted like a shield, protecting against unwanted fertilization.
meanings.sent5: The spermicide worked like a powerful barrier, blocking any chance of conception.

meanings.definition: A contraceptive method that prevents sperm from fertilizing an egg.
meanings.sent1: They decided to use spermicide as their chosen form of birth control.
meanings.sent2: The spermicide gel created a barrier to protect against pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: The spermicide made a great team with the condom to ensure no surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a treasure chest, holding the secret weapon - spermicide.
meanings.sent5: The spermicide was the hero in their story, saving them from unexpected parenthood.
